programme.desc: When Brainiac zaps Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to different places in time, the race is on for Batman and The Flash to reassemble the Justice League!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After Clarence and his friends call random numbers as a prank, Clarence ends up connecting with a girl and they strike up a friendship. But will it last?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Raven eats a bad meatball that causes tentacles to spring from her teeth and devour the other Titans.

programme.title: Hero Inside
programme.desc: X appears at Mikes house! Threatening Mike to hand over all the Hero Books, Mike ends up fleeing with Crying Man... and the secret about Xs identity is revealed!

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: After the Rustbucket breaks down, Ben, Gwen and Grandpa Max find themselves killing time at the local town library but soon scramble to out maneuver Hex as he searches for a hidden ancient artifact.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Finn and Jake decide its time for Finn to get a new sword. Finn reluctantly buys a grass sword from a mysterious old man, but the sword turns out to be cursed! And unfortunately for our hero, all sales are final.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy and Porky Pig ride through the jungle searching for treasures.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: In an escalating series of dares, Clarence eats five hundred hardboiled eggs, delighting the kids around him. As Clarence grows sicker and sicker, the kids get more and more grossed out until they want nothing to do with him.

programme.title: Uncle Grandpa
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny, unable to fulfill his eggdelivering duties, has Uncle Grandpa fill in for him.

programme.title: Ninjago Dragons Rising
programme.desc: The Ninjas search to defeat Shatterspin leads them to new masters while Cole returns home to find the Finders under attack.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to crack the code to reveal Lunias secrets while the Nightmare King presses a fullscale assault on Castle Nocturnia.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: King Snuggadoodle and the Huggaboopies invade Finn and Jakes tree house.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven finds some unusual new allies.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunias Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Its Geos birthday and hes really looking forward to celebrating it with his Tangranimal friends! But theyve never heard of birthdays! So Oula decides to go ahead and celebrate Geos birthday in her own special way!

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Izzy and Timmy go to dig up treasure at the top of Lawrence Pinecones Statues shadow... and find nothing there! The mysterious Pretty Big Thing is scaring the people of Pretty Big City, so its up to the Mechas to find out what it is.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: When all the ornaments on the Pretty Big City tree break, its up to the Mechas to build new ones and save the holidays for their friends. Its time for Zee and MacBarms gift exchange, but the snowman scarecrow Zee made for MacBarm keeps blowing away!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs waterpark. He keeps adding onto the design with the support of Bugs until problems arise.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: A study in contrasts enlivens this odd couples antics Baby Daffy is the compulsive mess maker, and Baby Sylvester is the cleanliness freak in this unique episode.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kungfu film genres most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by Dragon Gate Palace one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of Dragon Gate Palace, and uncover a longhidden secret.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Three Times Nothing
programme.desc: When three homeless friends win the lottery, they assume their lives are going to change drastically for the better. But claiming the money turns out to be more of a problem than a solution.

programme.title: NickOff Duty OTO
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mothers murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.desc: A riveting story behind the first manned mission to the moon, focusing on Neil Armstrong and the decade leading to the historic Apollo 11 flight.

programme.desc: The remaining contestants compete for the final Immunity Pin of the season. In round one, the contestants are given 60 minutes to make a dish with a sound to get the judges salivating.

programme.desc: Puyallup is the home of the Washington State Fair, attracting over a million fairgoers every year on its 160 acres of land in search of the best food creations the Pacific Northwest has to offer.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quidpropoo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal 1
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35yearold George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to humanraised kangaroos.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2022

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the days news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on senpai in Japan.

programme.title: Tokyos Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40 of Tokyos Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLDJAPAN
programme.desc: This time, we introduce changes starting in April, including the extension of NHK NEWSLINE and the launch of NHK NEWS 7. We also feature Japan in Focus moving to weekdays.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nations long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A drug approved in Japan in 2018 involves just one injection for lumbar disc hernias, helping many patients for whom surgery was the only way to control the pain. We look at how it works.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: BARBAPAPA One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbazoo have plenty of things to write about in his diary! After reading the biography of Nellie Bly, Barbalib is determined to become a Great Reporter!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. Paddington accepts an inventors award for Simi when shes too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: The Queen of Reptiles is visiting Isa, but the gardens a mess! Dora helps her get everything ready in time for La Reinas visit. Dora meets Sammy the Sloth, who needs to get to Day Camp on time so he can show everyone a special surprise.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate allnight race the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the GlowintheDark trophy!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: When Chef learns hes going to be on the cover of a cooking magazine, he obsesses over getting the perfect pic. At Chefs stargazing starfruit sleepover, Chef and Olly get so distracted with fun activities that their friends may miss the stars.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears hell lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and his friends visit Dad at the aquarium, but can they keep Dad from discovering Sharkdog?

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max is ready to go on his fun camping trip when Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious illness.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdingers Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay AllStars!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Turtles take the fight to Bishop but shes ready for them... get ready for MECHABIHSOP! But when the Mechazoids go out of control, can the Turtles save humanity?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick becomes the superhero PatrickMan, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottomwhether it wants it or not. Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds SpongeBobs diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the boxand off the road.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab, and tries everything to force it out. After getting his groceries stolen, Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties. PatThos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina helps Patrick get back onmodel. The Star family takes over the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie bottles up their feelings after not making the fearleading team & causes unintended electrical outbursts. After misguided efforts, Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister.

Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the propertys dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive exgirlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amys Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.
